entry.content:
This Apartment Is Situated On The Top Floor (3rd Fl.) Of A Mult-Family Property In Astoria's Most Prime Location, Only A Three Minute Walk To The N/W Train Station. This Location Can't Be Beat!

The Unit Consists Of Two Spacious Rooms And A Large Kitchen. It Can Easily Be Set Up As A One Or Two Bedroom Unit.

As A One Bedroom Apartment: The Unit Will Be Set With A Very Large Living Room, An Extra Large Bedroom (Both Rooms 14 X 15), And A Separate Eat-In-Kitchen.

(Each Room 14 X 15), With a Separate Kitchen And A Small Communal Living Area Which Could Accommodate A Small Couch, Table, TV Etc.

entry.title: $2150 // NO FEE NEWLY RENOVATED ONE BED APT 31ST AVE
entry.content:
NO FEE NEWLY RENOVATED ONE BED APT 31ST AVE

Listing ID #: 233568
Price: $2,150
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Approx. Size: 455 Sq. Ft.
Floor: 4
Pets: Cats Only (DEPOSIT $200)

Building Amenities

Close to Subway
Laundry
Live In Super

Apartment Amenities

Dishwasher
Hardwood
Renovated
Stainless Steel Appliances
Microwave

This pre-war, quiet, cozy, NO FEE One bed apartment, 1st floor apt is worth a viewing! You'll love the apt's hardwood floors throughout. The windows let in plenty of sunlight to brighten up the space. The rental has onsite laundry. In addition to the above, the rental comes with heat/hot included. You might never need it with NYC's many order-in options, but the kitchen was recently renovated and includes a window that opens and hardwood flooring. You'll find a gas oven, a gas range, stainless steel appliances, a full-sized refrigerator, dishwasher and plenty of storage. The bedroom has hardwood floors and a window that opens,you should have space for a queen sized bed. The bathroom includes a medicine cabinet and a standard tub. A window in the bathroom is an added plus. It's rare in NYC, at this price range, to find a building that's rarely available and leasing up fast. This building is exactly that. The full amenity list includes: a great super, a front door buzzer, and on street parking. CAT friendly apartment. Contact me at your earliest convenience.

Alina Borgovan
